resources.string: The key word that is going to generate the core of the password. That\'s the most important part of the password. So you must not forget it.
Signature is a sequence of characters that will be plainly present in your password. It\'s important that you use the same signature in all passwords and never show it to anyone.

This controls how big the core part of the password is, the maximum value it can be is 32 and the minimum is 1. However, we recommend you to keep it as 4 (which means the core part will be 8 characters wide).

This app is made for helping you in making unique and strong passwords based in a simple keyword. That way, you\'ll be able to recover the password as long as you remember the keyword and the settings you\'ve used.
This app was developed by Raymag.
